parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded. Additionally, electrical system failures can also lead to fires, which can result in serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: the running lights and cargo lights come on and go off for no reason
an odor comes from the vehicle

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the FICM and PCM computers can cause the engine to shut down completely, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine shuts down completely during normal driving conditions

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The battery drain issue can cause the battery to go dead after sitting for an extended period, leaving the driver stranded and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The battery goes dead after sitting for two or three weeks

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Slippage and Loss of Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission slippage and loss of power can cause the vehicle to stall or lose control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the vehicle skids to a complete stop
the transmission knocks or slips on acceleration and around corners.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Faulty gear shifting and engagement can cause the vehicle to unexpectedly shift into the wrong gear, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle does not always go into the correct gear
the vehicle goes into reverse when shifted into drive
the vehicle stays in neutral when shifted into reverse
the vehicle hovers in neutral then suddenly engages into 1st gear without moving the gear shift.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Torque converter failure can cause the vehicle to lose power and stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: the vehicle loses power and stops running
the vehicle skids to a complete stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can lead to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
Incorrect tire inflation can lead to premature tire wear, reduced fuel efficiency, and increased risk of tire failure, which can cause accidents and injuries.

The failure of the 6.0L Powerstroke engine can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded. Additionally, the engine problems can lead to overheating, which can cause damage to the engine and other components.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or loses power
the vehicle is unable to maintain adequate heat in the passenger compartment
the radiator fluid tests positive for oil product.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the FICM module can cause the engine to stall or lose power, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: the vehicle is unable to maintain speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling system can cause the engine to overheat, which can lead to damage to the engine and other components.
symptoms: the radiator fluid tests positive for oil product
the vehicle is unable to maintain adequate heat in the passenger compartment.
